name: RetryExportRun
description:
Retry a batch export run in Datadog.

Use this tool to retry a batch export run in Datadog. It leverages the same mechanism as backfilling, effectively retrying a single run.

parameters.name: batch_export_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the batch export run to retry. It should be provided as a string.

parameters.name: batch_export_run_id
parameters.description: A UUID string that identifies the specific batch export run to retry in Datadog.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this batch export run.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The Project ID you want to access in Datadog. Retrieve it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: retry_parameters
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details about the batch export run to retry, including status, error details, and timestamps.

status.description:
The status of this run.

* `Cancelled` - Cancelled
* `Completed` - Completed
* `ContinuedAsNew` - Continued As New
* `Failed` - Failed
* `FailedRetryable` - Failed Retryable
* `FailedBilling` - Failed Billing
* `Terminated` - Terminated
* `TimedOut` - Timedout
* `Running` - Running
* `Starting` - Starting

records_completed.description: The number of records that have been exported.

latest_error.description: The latest error that occurred during this run.

data_interval_start.description: The start of the data interval.

data_interval_end.description: The end of the data interval.

cursor.description: An opaque cursor that may be used to resume.

created_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun was created.

finished_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun finished, successfully or not.

last_updated_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun was last updated.

records_total_count.description: The total count of records that should be exported in this BatchExportRun.

bytes_exported.description: The number of bytes that have been exported in this BatchExportRun.

batch_export.description: The BatchExport this run belongs to.

backfill.description: The backfill this run belongs to.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this batch export run.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this batch export run.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
